biotools.summary:
fast and accurate prediction of protein solubility.

TISIGNER (tie-SIGN-er) includes TIsigner, SoDoPE and Razor, the protein expression optimisation, solubility optimisation and signal peptides prediction tools, respectively.

Optimise your protein coding sequences using smarter tools and algorithms!
